scripts.distribute: npm run git-daemon & serve ~/.npm & sleep 2s && node ./scripts/ipAndHostnameInfo.js
scripts.distribute-stop: kill $(ps -f | grep '[s]erve' | awk '{print $3}') && kill $(ps -f | grep '[g]it daemon' | awk '{print $3}')
scripts.find-processes-to-kill: ps aux | grep '[n]pm-offline' && ps aux | grep '[g]it daemon'
